pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.standard

Class StandardDataSetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.DataSetProvider
      • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.standard.StandardDataSetProvider

  • public class StandardDataSetProvider
extends DataSetProvider
    Satndard data set provider uses a StandardDataSetBuilder and a StandardDataSetProcessor to create & process data sets.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki
